nameList - Static variable in class common.controllers.ScoreFileProcesser
Static name list.
nextLevel() - Method in class objects.animal.Animal
It calls nextLevel() in AnimalModel to updates the status and number of ends of AnimalModel and add 1000pts for player.
nextLevel() - Method in class objects.animal.AnimalModel
Updates the status and number of ends of AnimalModel when player gets to next level.
nextLevel() - Method in class scene.controller.BoardController
Update board model and view when the player gets to the next level game.
nextLevel() - Method in class scene.controller.GameLevelController
Calls nextLevel() both in BoardController and Animal to updates scores in Board and Animal.
nextLevel(AnimalModel, BoardModel) - Static method in class common.controllers.GameChecker
Checks if the player is qualified to enter the next level.
noImage - Variable in class objects.physicalobject.Bonus
The second image of Bonus.
noMove - Variable in class objects.animal.AnimalModel
It indicates whether Animal can move.
noneImage - Variable in class objects.physicalobject.Seal

notifyAnimalObserver() - Method in class objects.animal.Animal
